django.contrib.gis.db.backends.utils
====================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.backends.utils

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   A collection of utility routines and classes used by the spatial
   backends.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.utils.SpatialOperator


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: SpatialOperator(op=None, func=None)

   Class encapsulating the behavior specific to a GIS operation (used by lookups).


   .. py:attribute:: sql_template
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: op
      :value: None



   .. py:attribute:: func
      :value: None



   .. py:property:: default_template


   .. py:method:: as_sql(connection, lookup, template_params, sql_params)
